definition: the activities of buying and selling goods or services
the amount of goods or services that a business buys and sells
the activity of buying and selling shares in companies

a particular area of business or industry
the people or companies who work in a particular business or industry
a job or type of work that someone is trained to do
the exchange of one thing for another, usually of the same value

trade with: Spain wants to develop its trade with the Philippines.

business activity:
a particular business or industry:
a job, especially one that needs special skill, that involves working with your hands:
the people who work in a particular business or industry or in the same one:
used to refer to the publishing of books, etc. that are aimed at the general public:
a newspaper, etc. produced for people working in a particular business or industry:
to buy and sell goods or services, especially between countries:
to be bought and sold, or to buy and sell shares, on the stock exchange:
to exchange something, or to stop using or doing something and start using or doing something else instead:
If people trade statements of a particular type, they say or tell them to each other:
the activity of buying and selling goods and services esp. between countries:
A trade is the act of exchanging one thing for another.
a job, esp. one that needs special skill and that involves working with your hands, or the type of work in which such skills are needed:

to buy, sell, or exchange goods:

definition: A young hyper-masculine looking gay man, usually black or latino in urban contexts. Trade typically dress in urban clothing and play to the thug stereotype. The term "trade" originated from the notion that these men were only gay for pay-- thus they would "trade" sex for money. In recent years, the term has come to refer to any gay men of color who dress in hip-hop inspired clothing and play into the masc fetish.

Marginalized Orientations, Gender identities, And Intersex. it’s meant to be an all inclusive umbrella term for asexuals, homosexuals, multisexuals, trans people, and intersex people. Alternative to LGBTQIAP+
Alternative to MOGII, easier to pronounce.
A man who messes around with other men, but no one would ever know by looking or talking to him. Used by gay black men to identify masculine gay men or DL Brothas.

A theoretically straight man who likes to "sit back and get serviced" by gay/bi men, with little or no sexual reciprocation. (Note: It is specifically the lack of interest in reciprocating that defines a man as "trade.")
Usually means to send nudes, or trade pics means “send nudes”.
A term from New Orleans that represents a guy that a girl is fuckin widd but not in a relationship with, or who she thinks is attractive.
A masculine acting gay male
